SEARCH
Module org.eclipse.persistence.core
Package org.eclipse.persistence.oxm.mappings.converters

Interface XMLConverter

All Superinterfaces:
Converter, CoreConverter<DatabaseMapping,Session>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultElementConverter, DomHandlerConverter, JAXBElementConverter, JAXBElementRootConverter, TypeStringConverter, XMLConverterAdapter, XMLJavaTypeConverter, XMLRootConverter
public interface XMLConverter extends Converter

Purpose: Conversion interface to allow conversion between object and data types. This can be used in any mapping to convert between the object and data types without requiring code placed in the object model. This extension of the Converter interface allows for the XMLMarshaller and XMLUnmarshaller to be passed into the conversion methods.

See Also:
  • Converter
  • XMLDirectMapping
  • XMLCompositeDirectCollectionMapping
  • XMLCompositeObjectMapping
  • XMLCompositeCollectionMapping
